com.randallscharpf.java.jmorsecoding.beeper

Class Beeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.randallscharpf.java.jmorsecoding.beeper.Beeper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Delayer, OnOff, Openable

    public class Beeper
extends java.lang.Object
implements OnOff, Delayer, Openable
    The state setter and delayer for a single Morse Code physical layer. The "on" state represents that noise-making is occurring, and the "off" state represents silence. The delayer causes the audio output to continue producing the sound (or lack thereof) corresponding to the most recently set state for the specified amount of time.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Beeper.WaveType
      Supported common waveform shapes giving tonal control.

      Creates a beeper.

      • Beeper

        public Beeper(java.util.function.Supplier<Beeper.WaveType> waveform)
       throws javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException
        Creates a beeper at full volume that uses the pitch A4 (440Hz). The tone of the waveform can be set and adjusted in real-time as each beep is queued.
        Parameters:
        waveform - the shape of the wave, which determines its tone
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - if the audio device cannot be opened
        Since:
        1.0

      • Beeper

        public Beeper(java.util.function.DoubleSupplier pitch,
              java.util.function.Supplier<Beeper.WaveType> waveform)
       throws javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException
        Creates a beeper at full volume. The pitch of the waveform can be set and adjusted in real-time as audio is queued, and the tone of the waveform can be set and adjusted in real-time as each beep is queued.
        Parameters:
        pitch - the frequency of the wave, in Hz
        waveform - the shape of the wave, which determines its tone
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - if the audio device cannot be opened
        Since:
        1.0

      • Beeper

        public Beeper(java.util.function.DoubleSupplier pitch,
              java.util.function.DoubleSupplier volume,
              java.util.function.Supplier<Beeper.WaveType> waveform)
       throws javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException
        Creates a beeper. The pitch and volume of the waveform can be set and adjusted in real-time as audio is queued, and the tone of the waveform can be set and adjusted in real-time as each beep is queued.
        Parameters:
        pitch - the frequency of the wave, in Hz
        volume - the volume percent at which to do playback
        waveform - the shape of the wave, which determines its tone
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - if the audio device cannot be opened
        Since:
        1.0
